releases.releaseNotes:
## What's Changed
* docs: add Crush to supported AI tools in README by @TabishB in https://github.com/Fission-AI/OpenSpec/pull/235
* fix: use change-id as fallback title instead of "Untitled Change" by @TabishB in https://github.com/Fission-AI/OpenSpec/pull/236
* fix: prevent false 'already configured' detection for tools by @TabishB in https://github.com/Fission-AI/OpenSpec/pull/239
* fix: recreate missing openspec template files in extend mode by @TabishB in https://github.com/Fission-AI/OpenSpec/pull/238
* docs: add guidance for populating project-level context by @harikrishnan83 in https://github.com/Fission-AI/OpenSpec/pull/241
* feat: add CoStrict AI assistant support  by @mini2s in https://github.com/Fission-AI/OpenSpec/pull/240
* feat: add Qoder CLI support to configuration and documentation by @KUTEJiang in https://github.com/Fission-AI/OpenSpec/pull/261
* feat: add  support to apply slash command by @TabishB in https://github.com/Fission-AI/OpenSpec/pull/244
* feat: add Qwen Code support with slash command integration by @AndersHsueh in https://github.com/Fission-AI/OpenSpec/pull/250
* chore: add changeset for AI assistants support and configuration improvements by @TabishB in https://github.com/Fission-AI/OpenSpec/pull/270
* chore(release): version packages by @github-actions[bot] in https://github.com/Fission-AI/OpenSpec/pull/271

## New Contributors
* @mini2s made their first contribution in https://github.com/Fission-AI/OpenSpec/pull/240
* @KUTEJiang made their first contribution in https://github.com/Fission-AI/OpenSpec/pull/261
* @AndersHsueh made their first contribution in https://github.com/Fission-AI/OpenSpec/pull/250

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Fission-AI/OpenSpec/compare/v0.13.0...v0.14.0
